title: Can you study in a university in Japan without starting university in the UK? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. But you will need to have an understanding of the Japanese language to be able to “get by” there: Entering Japanese university

you would need at least N1 of the Japanese Language Proficiency test to be admitted as a regular student.most classes here are taught in Japanese though some universities offer classes/courses taught jn English.
